titleStmt.title: Here begynneth the Temple of glas
Temple of glas
titleStmt.author: Lydgate, John, 1370?-1451?

notesStmt.note: By John Lydgate. Wrongly attributed to Stephen Hawes.
With Wynkyn de Worde's mark on the last page.
Secondo folio: And fyrst of all I saugh there of cartage ..
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (reel 1:10) and the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery (reel 519:15).
